snippet.title: Crest  - an indirect god sim | Cinematic Launch Trailer |
snippet.description:
Crest is NOW AVAILABLE on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/341710/Crest__an_indirect_god_sim/

Become a god in this indirect god sim. Influence and try to control your followers using commandments but beware, free will leaves these open to interpretation. Will you create a flourishing civilization or lead them into cannibalism?

Song credits:
Composer: Tuomas Nikkinen
Guitars: Jari Aarniala
Vocals: Sami Honkonen

---

http://eatcreatesleep.net/
https://twitter.com/CrestGame
https://twitter.com/EatCreateSleep
